translations: 1. 使丰富，使充实：增加某物的价值、质量或吸引力。
旅行使我们的生活更加丰富。
2. 使富裕：使某人财富增加。
· The new job enriches him financially.
新工作使他财务上变得更富有。

sentences.sentence: Reciting poems not only enriches my knowledge, but also makes my job less boring.
sentences.translation: 背诵诗歌不仅丰富了我的知识，也使我的工作不那么无聊。

sentences.sentence: Downloading and testing some of them might inspire you to become more of an expert at something that enriches your life more than any computer game ever could.
sentences.translation: 下载并测试其中一些程序可能会激发您成为某方面的专家，这比任何计算机游戏都更能充实您的生活。

sentences.sentence: I hope this Christmas enriches your life.
sentences.translation: 希望圣诞节丰富了你的生活。
